org.eclipse.smarthome.model.rule.jvmmodel

Class RulesThingRefresher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.model.rule.jvmmodel.RulesRefresher
      • org.eclipse.smarthome.model.rule.jvmmodel.RulesThingRefresher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RegistryChangeListener<Thing>, ThingRegistryChangeListener

    public class RulesThingRefresher
extends RulesRefresher
implements ThingRegistryChangeListener
    The RulesThingRefresher is responsible for reloading rules resources every time a thing is added or removed.
    Author:
    Maoliang Huang - Initial contribution
